member.name: T:OculusBuildApp
member.summary: Allows Oculus to build apps from the command line.

member.name: T:OVRScreenshotWizard
member.summary: From the selected transform, takes a cubemap screenshot that can be submitted with the application as a screenshot (or additionally used for reflection shaders).

member.name: M:OVRScreenshotWizard.CreateAssetPath(System.String)
member.summary: Create the asset path if it is not available. Assuming the newFolderPath is stated with "Assets", which is a requirement.

member.name: M:OVRScreenshotWizard.GenerateTexture(UnityEngine.Cubemap,System.String)
member.summary: Generates a NPOT 6x1 cubemap in the following format PX NX PY NY PZ NZ

member.name: M:OVRScreenshotWizard.TakeOVRScreenshot
member.summary: Unity Editor menu option to take a screenshot
